statements: SELECT * FROM geofencing_notifications;
SELECT id, user_id, notification_type FROM geofencing_notifications;
SELECT location_id, notification_type, notification_message FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM geofencing_notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, notification_message FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'alert' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, notification_type, notification_message FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM geofencing_notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE notification_type LIKE '%alert%' AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'warning' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT name, location FROM geofences WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT geofence_id, name, location, radius FROM geofences ORDER BY radius DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'entered' ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_message FROM geofence_notifications WHERE geofence_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT name, location, radius FROM geofences ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT notification_id, geofence_id, user_id, notification_type FROM geofence_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'enter' ORDER BY notification_timestamp ASC;

SELECT geofences.name, geofence_notifications.notification_message FROM geofences JOIN geofence_notifications ON geofences.geofence_id = geofence_notifications.geofence_id WHERE geofence_notifications.user_id = 12345;
SELECT AVG(radius), COUNT(*) FROM geofences WHERE location LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT notification_id, notification_type FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 20 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE longitude BETWEEN -10 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM notifications JOIN users ON notifications.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM geofence_locations JOIN notifications ON geofence_locations.id = notifications.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, notification_text FROM notifications WHERE notification_type LIKE '%urgent%' OR notification_type LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_locations;
SELECT user_id, username, notification_preference FROM users;
SELECT user_id, location_id, entered_at, exited_at FROM user_locations;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, location_id, notification_type, notification_time FROM notifications;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE notification_preference = TRUE;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, location_id FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'SMS' ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT * FROM user_locations ul JOIN users u ON ul.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT notification_id, notification_type FROM user_geofence_notifications WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT rule_name, min_radius FROM geofence_rules WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE longitude < -90 ORDER BY location_name ASC;

SELECT users.username, geofence_locations.location_name, user_geofence_notifications.notification_type FROM users JOIN user_geofence_notifications ON users.user_id = user_geofence_notifications.user_id JOIN geofence_locations ON user_geofence_notifications.location_id = geofence_locations.location_id;
SELECT rule_name, min_radius, active FROM geofence_rules WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY min_radius DESC;
